name: Dino World 3D - Hunter Guys
description:
Dino World 3D - Hunter Guys!!!Journey to a hidden, prehistoric jurassic island and kill the biggest and most ferocious animals in history with access to powerful guns.In this epic game the dinosaurs are not extinct. These dinosaurs are as real. Become a ultimate dino hunter, catch your prey!
FEATURES
- Huge jurassic world, open to explore!
- Console Quality HD graphics
- Unique hunting accessories
- 3D dinosaurs, from the Herbivorous to Carnivorous
- Immersive hunting missions to complete
